meanings.definition: A small amount of something that remains after the main part has gone or been taken or used.
meanings.sent1: The residues of the cake were all that was left after the party.
meanings.sent2: She wiped the residues of the spilled milk with a cloth.
meanings.sent3: The cat left residues of its fur all over the couch.
meanings.sent4: The old building held residues of memories from the past.
meanings.sent5: The residues of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: The part of something that is left after the rest has been used or taken.
meanings.sent1: After the harvest, the residues of corn stalks were plowed back into the soil.
meanings.sent2: The residues of the ink cartridge needed to be replaced.
meanings.sent3: The residues of the jigsaw puzzle were scattered on the table.
meanings.sent4: His speech left residues of inspiration in the hearts of the audience.
meanings.sent5: The residues of the storm lingered in the form of puddles on the road.
